import React, {useState} from 'react'; import {Link} from 'react-router-dom'; import { AiFillCamera } from "react-icons/ai"; import { BsThreeDots, BsPencil } from "react-icons/bs"; import {PUBLIC_URL} from "./../../../Constants/public.jsx"; function HeaderProfile(){ const [toggleSpan, setToggleSpan] = useState(); const [toggleTopLeft, setToggleTopLeft] = useState(); console.log('public url: ', process.env.PUBLIC_URL); function handleShow(){ setToggleSpan({ visibility: 'visible' }) setToggleTopLeft({ background: 'rgba(0,0,0,0.3)', border: '2px solid white ', borderRadius:'3px' }) } function handleHide(){ setToggleSpan({ visibility: 'hidden' }) setToggleTopLeft({ background: 'none', border: '2px solid transparent ', }) } return( <>
handleShow()} onMouseOut={() => handleHide()} >
Nguyễn Văn Phước

) } export default HeaderProfile;
